8 namespace zserio

10 namespace pmr

12 namespace detail

14 
18 template <class T = uint8_t>
19 class PolymorphicAllocatorBase
20 {
21 public:
22  using value_type = T;
23 
24  // Following typedefs are only present for compatibility with older std. libraries, that does not fully
25  // conform to C++11. [old-compiler-support]
26  using pointer = value_type*;
27  using const_pointer = const value_type*;
28  using size_type = std::size_t;
29  using difference_type = std::ptrdiff_t;
30  using reference = value_type&;
31  using const_reference = const value_type&;
32 
43  PolymorphicAllocatorBase(MemoryResource* resource = getDefaultResource()) noexcept
44  : m_resource(resource != nullptr ? resource : getDefaultResource()) // non-standard extension
45  {}
46 
51  PolymorphicAllocatorBase(const PolymorphicAllocatorBase& other) noexcept = default;
52  PolymorphicAllocatorBase& operator=(const PolymorphicAllocatorBase& other) noexcept = default;
62  template <class U>
63  PolymorphicAllocatorBase(const PolymorphicAllocatorBase<U>& other) noexcept
64  : m_resource(other.resource())
65  {}
66 
72  template <class U>
73  PolymorphicAllocatorBase& operator=(const PolymorphicAllocatorBase<U>& other) noexcept
74  {
75  m_resource = other.resource();
76  return *this;
77  }
78 
84  value_type* allocate(std::size_t n)
85  {
86  return static_cast<value_type*>(m_resource->allocate(n * sizeof(value_type), alignof(value_type)));
87  }
88 
96  void deallocate(value_type* p, std::size_t n) noexcept
97  {
98  m_resource->deallocate(p, n * sizeof(value_type), alignof(value_type));
99  }
100 
104  MemoryResource* resource() const noexcept
105  {
106  return m_resource;
107  }
108 
117  template <typename U, typename... Args>
118  void construct(U* ptr, Args&&... args)
119  noexcept(noexcept(new(static_cast<void*>(ptr)) U(std::forward<Args>(args)...)))
120  {
121  new(static_cast<void*>(ptr)) U(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
122  }
123 
131  template <typename U>
132  void destroy(U* ptr) noexcept(noexcept(ptr->~U()))
133  {
134  ptr->~U();
135  }
136 
144  size_type max_size() const noexcept
145  {
146  return std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max() / sizeof(value_type);
147  }
148 
149 private:
150  MemoryResource* m_resource;
151 };
152 
153 template <class T, class U>
154 bool operator==(const PolymorphicAllocatorBase<T>& lhs, const PolymorphicAllocatorBase<U>& rhs) noexcept
155 {
156  return *lhs.resource() == *rhs.resource();
157 }
158 
159 template <class T, class U>
160 bool operator!=(const PolymorphicAllocatorBase<T>& lhs, const PolymorphicAllocatorBase<U>& rhs) noexcept
161 {
162  return !(lhs == rhs);
163 }
164 
165 } // namespace detail
166 
171 template <class T = uint8_t>
172 class PolymorphicAllocator : public detail::PolymorphicAllocatorBase<T>
173 {
174 public:
175  using detail::PolymorphicAllocatorBase<T>::PolymorphicAllocatorBase;
176 
177  using propagate_on_container_copy_assignment = std::false_type;
178  using propagate_on_container_move_assignment = std::false_type;
179  using propagate_on_container_swap = std::false_type;
180 
184  PolymorphicAllocator select_on_container_copy_construction() const
185  {
186  return PolymorphicAllocator();
187  }
188 
194  template<typename U>
195  struct rebind
196  {
197  typedef PolymorphicAllocator<U> other;
198  };
199 };
200 
204 template <class T = uint8_t>
205 class PropagatingPolymorphicAllocator : public detail::PolymorphicAllocatorBase<T>
206 {
207 public:
208  using detail::PolymorphicAllocatorBase<T>::PolymorphicAllocatorBase;
209 
210  using propagate_on_container_copy_assignment = std::true_type;
211  using propagate_on_container_move_assignment = std::true_type;
212  using propagate_on_container_swap = std::true_type;
213 
217  PropagatingPolymorphicAllocator select_on_container_copy_construction() const
218  {
219  return *this;
220  }
221 
227  template<typename U>
228  struct rebind
229  {
230  typedef PropagatingPolymorphicAllocator<U> other;
231  };
232 };
